{{also|Grillen}} ==Dutch== ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|nl|Nl-grillen.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhyme|nl|ɪlən}} ===Noun=== {{head|nl|noun plural form}} # {{nl-noun form of|pl|gril}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== {{bor|de|en|grill}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-grillen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|grillt|grillte|gegrillt}} # to [[grill]] #: {{syn|de|grillieren|q1=Switzerland}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|grill|gegrillt|h}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden|grillen_roesten_braten_zubereiten}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{der|lb|en|grill}}, at least in part through {{der|lb|de|grillen}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈɡʀilən/}} * {{rhymes|lb|ilən}} ===Verb=== {{lb-verb}} # {{lb|lb|transitive}} to [[grill]] ====Conjugation==== {{lb-conj-regular|grill|gegrillt|hunn}} ---- ==Middle English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|enm|grullen|grüllen}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|enm|ang|grillan}}, {{m|ang|griellan||to vex, annoy, offend}}, from {{der|enm|gem-pro|*grel-||to shout, make angry}}, from {{der|enm|ine-pro|*gher-||to rattle, make a noise, grumble}}. Cognate with {{cog|gml|grellen||to enrage}}, {{cog|dum|grillen||to growl}}, {{cog|gmh|grellen}}, {{m|gmh|grillen||to shout, howl}}, {{cog|de|grollen||to rumble}}. ===Verb=== {{head|enm|verb}} # to [[irritate]], [[annoy]] # to be [[grievous]] to, [[vex]] #* '''14c.''', Anonymous, ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chester_Mystery_Plays The Chester Mystery Plays]'', [https://web.archive.org/web/20150223105213/http://machias.edu/faculty/necastro/drama/chester/play_03.html Noah's Flood],: #*: Thy byddinge, lorde, I shall fulfill
#*: Nor never more thee greeve ne '''gryll'''
